channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NY Democrats Seek To Punish Musk Over His Politics
item.description: A Democrat member of the state legislature has introduced a bill avowedly aimed at punishing Elon Musk for his political activities.

item.title: Report: Medicaid Double Payments Cost Taxpayers $4.3 Billion In Three Years
item.description: Is this what Democrats want to defend when they say they want to 'protect Medicaid'?

item.title: ‘Hillbilly’ Vance And Billionaire Trump Are Relatable For The Same Reason
item.description: The public has come to know J.D. Vance as their fellow American — not a cheap imitation but the real deal.

item.title: Snow White Bombing Was The Best Gift Hollywood Could Give Us
item.description: Only from the ashes of such a magnificent and glorious failure can Hollywood return to its glory days.

item.title: Trump’s Nonemergency Tariffs
item.description: This is an abuse of language and logic in the service of bad policy that hardly interacts with the alleged threat to national security.

item.title: Rubio, in Europe, says US has to 'reset the global order of trade' and Trump is 'absolutely right to do it'
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio said the U.S. has "to reset the global order of trade" and that President Donald Trump is "absolutely right to do it."

item.title: The pushback begins: China imposes 34% tariff on U.S. goods
item.description: China is slapping a 34% tariff on goods it imports from the U.S. in direct retaliation for President Trump's sweeping trade crackdown.

item.title: The Week: Trump’s Liberation Day Tax Hike
